code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import data from"../../epicure.json";export var dishesSlicer=createSlice({name:"dishes",initialState:{value:data.dishes,allDishes:data.dishes,specificDishes:data.dishes,restaurants:data.restaurant},reducers:{getDishesByRestId:function getDishesByRestId(state,action){state.specificDishes=state.allDishes.filter(function(dish){var _state$restaurants$fi;return dish.restaurantId===((_state$restaurants$fi=state.restaurants.find(function(rest){return rest.name===action.payload;}))===null||_state$restaurants$fi===void 0?void 0:_state$restaurants$fi.id);});},dishTimeFilter:function dishTimeFilter(state,action){switch(action.payload){case"Breakfast":state.value=state.specificDishes.filter(function(dish){return dish.time.find(function(time){return time==="breakfast";});});break;case"Lunch":state.value=state.specificDishes.filter(function(dish){return dish.time.find(function(time){return time==="lunch";});});break;case"Dinner":state.value=state.specificDishes.filter(function(dish){return dish.time.find(function(time){return time==="dinner";});});break;default:state.value=state.specificDishes;break;}}}});var _dishesSlicer$actions=dishesSlicer.actions,dishTimeFilter=_dishesSlicer$actions.dishTimeFilter,getDishesByRestId=_dishesSlicer$actions.getDishesByRestId;export{dishTimeFilter,getDishesByRestId};export default dishesSlicer.reducer;
